name: 2 Minute Drill
description:
Just running some scoring drills in practice with your center & wide receiver. Hit the green zone to score a touchdown! Hit the red, and you just kinda hold the ball, not liking what you're seeing on the field. Hit any arrow key or the X or Z keys to stop the slider and do it again to start the slider back up. When the clock hits 0, the game is over.

This game was written in 559 characters of code for TweetTweetJam 7, where the goal is to create a game in code that fits in two tweets worth of characters. Check out the game's jam page for the source!
